name: lab journal-Desire
description: A study journal written in a strange mishmash of Japanese and English languages.  It begins with a description of the research results of XE037 and its useful methods of utilization, concluding with the birth rate graphs in the United States.  It's stamped "DENIED" three times...

name: Dictionnaire Infernal
description: Written by Jacques Auguste Simon Collin de Plancy, this book describes a wide array of worldly beliefs and folklore such demonology, superstitions, divinations and notable people.
